infos.value: So this is what I get for sympathizing with Yezagh...
I don't know what lies Sadali has whispered in your ears...
But the privatization of the Arms Dealers' Guild will only spread misery.
You claim that's not what you already do?
We've sold weapons to all nations fairly and with impartiality.
This is what has ensured the balance of power.
You think you've been fair? That your actions have maintained equality!?
Don't you know what this has done to us...!?
The people of Yezagh have been treated as slaves for as long as they have known!
The curse of my people's history ends this day...
